    • Method Detail

      • checkIn

        public Room checkIn(java.lang.String pass,
                    java.lang.String name)
        Checks in the Guest in a free Room.
        Parameters:
        pass - password for checking in
        name - name of the guest
        Returns:
        A object Room with a Guest of the given name checked in.

      • checkOut

        public void checkOut(java.lang.String name)
        Checks out the guest and the safe in the room is deactivated.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the guest

      • getFreeRoom

        public Room getFreeRoom()
        Returns an available Room
        Returns:
        Room where no Guest is checked in or null if there is no free Room available.

      • getRoom

        public Room getRoom(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the room of the given Guest.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the guest
        Returns:
        Room where the Guest is checked in or null if there is no such room of guest.

      • getPassword

        public Password getPassword()
        Returns the Password object of the Hotel.
        Returns:
        Password belonging to the Hotel

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string with a description of all the guests, rooms and safes.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
